data.details: Eleanor wants to check her emails and catch up on any news.

results.simulacra_profiles.sim_3e912d.last_obser: Eleanor realized she should check her emails.

data.outcome_description: Eleanor Hayes realized she should check her emails.

data.narrative: Eleanor stretches in bed, the thought of unread emails pulling her from the last vestiges of sleep. Sunlight streams through the window, illuminating dust motes dancing in the air as she mentally prepares to face the digital world. The faint sound of a garbage truck (npc_concept_garbage_truck_01) rumbles in the distance, a familiar weekday morning serenade.

data.details: Eleanor looks around the room to get her bearings.

results.simulacra_profiles.sim_3e912d.last_obser: Eleanor Hayes is in her bedroom. Sunlight streams through the window.

data.outcome_description: Eleanor Hayes looked around the room.

data.narrative: Eleanor blinks, adjusting to the bright morning light flooding her bedroom. The rumpled **duvet (duvet_bedroom_01)** is pushed to the foot of the **bed (bed_bedroom_01)**. To her left, the worn **wooden nightstand (nightstand_bedroom_01)** holds a half-empty glass of water and her phone. Across the room, she sees the familiar outline of her **closet (closet_bedroom_01)**. The closed **door (door_to_hallway_01)** to the hallway is slightly ajar, a sliver of muted light spilling in from the rest of the apartment.

discovered_objects.name: Bed
discovered_objects.description: A bed with a rumpled duvet.

discovered_objects.name: Nightstand
discovered_objects.description: A worn wooden nightstand with a glass of water and a phone.

discovered_objects.name: Door to Hallway
discovered_objects.description: A slightly ajar door leading to the hallway.

discovered_connections.description: A slightly ajar door leading to the hallway.

data.details: Go through the Door to Hallway.
Eleanor walks through the door and into the hallway.

data.narrative: Eleanor steps out of her bedroom and into the hallway. The cool air is a stark contrast to the warmth of her bed. A framed **watercolor painting (painting_hallway_01)** of a sailboat hangs slightly askew on the wall. A small **coat rack (coatrack_hallway_01)** stands near the entrance to the living room, a light jacket slung over one of the hooks. The faint aroma of cleaning supplies lingers in the air, a reminder of yesterday's chores. From the living room, she can hear the muffled sound of a morning news program on TV (npc_concept_news_anchor_01).

discovered_objects.name: Watercolor Painting
discovered_objects.description: A framed watercolor painting of a sailboat.

discovered_objects.name: Coat Rack
discovered_objects.description: A small coat rack with a light jacket.

discovered_connections.description: An open doorway leading into the living room.

discovered_npcs.name: News Anchor
discovered_npcs.description: Muffled sound of a morning news program on TV.
